ModMetaData.name: {{cookiecutter.mod_name}} - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: {{cookiecutter.author}}
ModMetaData.description: {{cookiecutter.in_game_description}} (This is the dev version of {{cookiecutter.mod_name}}. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
